Sequence Information.Peptide Name: [Lys4, Ala16] brevinine-1pl (brevinine-1pl I4K,I16A analog, Synthetic AMPs, XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Wang J, Hu J, Pu W, Chen X, Ma C, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M, Wang L. 2024
Literature.Reference: Comput Struct Biotechnol J. 2024 Sep 19;23:3391-3406. doi: 10.1016/j.csbj.2024.09.006.PubMed
Literature.Title: Discovery, Development and Optimisation of a Novel Frog Antimicrobial Peptide with Combined Mode of Action Against Drug-resistant Bacteria

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (91.67%) tobrevinine-1plK: 25%; V=F: 13%; A: 17%.Activity: S. aureus NCTC 6538 or MRSA 12,493 (MIC 4 uM), E. faecium NCTC 12,697 (MIC 32 uM), E. coli ATCC 8739 (MIC 4 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC 43,816 (MIC 8 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC CRM 9027 (MIC 8 uM), A. baumannii BAA 747 (MIC 8 uM), and C. albicans ATCC 10,231 (MIC 32 uM). MBC same or slightly higher.Structure: random coil in buffer NH4Ac and helical in 50% TFE.In vitro toxicity: horse RBC: HC50 84.86 uM, hemolytic.
